模块 com.example.demo
程序包 com.example.demo.Actor.Boss

类 BossHealthBar

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.HBox
com.example.demo.Actor.Boss.BossHealthBar
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class BossHealthBar extends javafx.scene.layout.HBox
A standalone class representing the Boss's health bar using an HBox layout. The health bar is represented visually with a ProgressBar, without any text.

  • 属性概要

    从类继承的属性 javafx.scene.layout.HBox

  • 字段详细资料

    • initialHealth

      private int initialHealth
      The initial health value of the Boss. This is used to calculate the health percentage for the progress bar.

    • healthBar

      private final javafx.scene.control.ProgressBar healthBar
      The ProgressBar used to represent the Boss's health. This visual element is updated as the Boss's health changes.

    • WIDTH

      private static final int WIDTH
      The width of the health bar in pixels. It defines how wide the progress bar will be displayed.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

    • HEIGHT

      private static final int HEIGHT
      The height of the health bar in pixels. It defines how tall the progress bar will be displayed.
      另请参阅:
      • 常量字段值

  • 构造器详细资料

    • BossHealthBar

      public BossHealthBar(int initialHealth)
      Constructor for the BossHealthBar. Initializes the health bar with the specified initial health of the Boss.
      参数:
      initialHealth - The initial health of the Boss.

  • 方法详细资料

    • createHealthBar

      private javafx.scene.control.ProgressBar createHealthBar()
      Creates and styles the ProgressBar to represent the Boss's health.
      返回:
      A styled ProgressBar object.

    • updateHealth

      public void updateHealth(int bossHealth)
      Updates the Boss's health and refreshes the health bar display. The health bar's progress will be updated based on the current health.
      参数:
      bossHealth - The current health of the Boss.

    • setLayout

      public void setLayout(double xPosition, double yPosition)
      Sets the position of the health bar on the screen.
      参数:
      xPosition - The X position for the health bar.
      yPosition - The Y position for the health bar.

    • hide

      public void hide()
      Hides the Boss's health bar from the screen.

    • show

      public void show()
      Shows the Boss's health bar on the screen. The health bar will be brought to the front of the view.
